title: BrainStuff Classics: Is There Another Reason You Shouldn't Eat Raw Cookie Dough?
itunes:title: BrainStuff Classics: Is There Another Reason You Shouldn't Eat Raw Cookie Dough?
description:
Research has revealed another danger lurking in uncooked dough: Tenacious E. coli can survive in dry flour. Learn how scientists figured it out in this classic episode of BrainStuff.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
